content.detailedDescription: I am a scientist. md with a specialty. i had never seen anyhting like this beforr! i was in my lanai which faces east talking on the phone, when i noticed 2 lights far in the distance which initially looked like 2 planes going to tampa airport, but caught my attention because they seemed too close to each other. being a logical person, i decided they were probably at different altitudes and distances from me, so they probably were not really close to each other. nevertheless these lights seemed to be the same size, white/bluish in color, with no blinking or change whatsoever in the characteristics of the lights as they came closer to me, except of course they were growing bigger. far in the distance towards the ne there was a plane flying, and i could clearly see smaller, blinking lights. the 2 bluish lights  came to a point approx. 3 to 6 miles from where i was, and all of a sudden started circling each other. that's when i realized they were really close to each other! again, i thought "maybe they're helicopters". but i didn't see a beam of light... and the lights never changed even though they were circling each other... so the light was not on the front of the craft, it was all around it! then they started spiraling up and down while still going around each other, until they got lost behind the tree line, even though i could still see the lights intermitently through the branches. they went back up (and down) flying in the same pattern 3 more times, then they finally disappeared behind the tree line. i tried to record a video first with my cellphone, then with a video camera, but the lights were not that bright... just pleasantly bright, and in the middle of a pitch black sky my cameras were not able to find the lights!!! i'm so sorry about it! the more i think about it the more i compare what i saw with anything that could seem logical or "earthly", but there is no human aircraft that could have had this kind of light or flight pattern.
content.summary: 2 bluish lights coming straight, then spiraling up and down several times

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my backyard sky watching when i saw a very bright red orange star directly west it was around 10:00 pm at that time. i noticed it because it was so bright and i had never seen a star that was that color. however i just assumed it was venus or one of those very bright planets. i looked away and started to scan the rest of the sky, a few minutes later i looked back at the spot where the bright star was and it was gone, it did not change position as i looked everywhere near where it was but it was no where to be found. when i first saw it i looked at it through my binoculars but their not all that strong and it still looked like a star or a very small glowing orb, i didn't think that was strange since i figured it was a planet, it was only after i noticed it gone that i started to wonder if i had seen a ufo. there were no clouds and i stayed outside for at least 15 to 20 minutes longer waiting for it to reappear, it never did.

possible explanations:

landing lights. planes often look like their standing still if they are flying the the same direction as they are being viewed, however landing lights blink and flicker, this light was steady and through my binoculars it didn't look like a plane or any kind of air craft. my binoculars may not be strong but i can make out the shapes of planes at very high altitudes.

the only other explanation i can think of is that it may have been a meteor hitting the atmosphere and then burning out as it passed through. but i dont know what this looks like so i am not sure if it fits, as i said it was glowing a red orange star like thing which through binoculars looked round like a small orb. not sure if that could be a meteor. does anyone have any idea what this could be? and has anyone seen this in the area? if so let me know
content.summary: Red orange star seen in western sky disappears

content.detailedDescription: I have 3 events, so difficult to answer your questions.  all were at cruise ship ports as i like watching the ships come and go.  the first one was in port everglades (fort lauderdale).  it was on dec 9, 2012.  it was early morning while still dark out.  above the ships was what looked like old fashioned circus tents with peaks up top i have two photos...One shows the ships below and the other doesn't.  you can also see the reflection of my christmas tree.  sorry. i have photos and some video of all three events but i don't know if i can send them as i was watching them on a live webcam and they are "copywrighted".  anyhow, the second event happened sept 18 & 19, 2013 (the first time there)in bermuda (kings wharf).  i was watching through a cruise ship's "bridge cam" when it was dark.  don't know if it had an infrared camera, but i was able to see this very tall thing at the far end of the dock.  it was black and it reminded me of something i'd seen before.  it was like that scene in "men in black" where there was this tall "pilar" (like what hold up an overpass on the highways) and then this disk on top of it, except the top of the one i saw seemed to be leaning backwards a bit.  now off to the left of the disk it looked like some child got a hold of a black magic marker and drew lines from it toward the water where another ship could park (but wasn't).  they were somewhat straight lines but at one point it looked almost like a triangle.  also on both sides of the dock, some of the water looked lit up.  not a bright light, but lighter than the surounding water on either side of it.  no light bulbs.  just lit up.  also on video i talk about how i was seeing these bright lights one which stayed on all the time and one appearing to be next to it would go off for awhile and then back on.  one was a white light and the flashing one green.  the white one seems to be about where the small cruise ship terminal is located, but i don't see a whole building lit up.  it's not like windows. it was also nightime where there shouldn't be anyone in that terminal especially since there was no ship at that part of the wharf.  oh by the way, the "bridge cam" isn't continuous.  it changes every 30 seconds.  the next two times this ship came into this port, the captain parked it facing in the oposite direction.  don't know why as it has always parked the other way.  so the camera was useless those weeks.  the next event was in port canaveral on september 28th.  as usual i was waiting to see if any cruise ships were coming in the wee hours of the morning.  when the port came up there was this bright white six-sided thingy not too far from the water.  it was a little bleary, but it looked like the sides were straight up and down on the sides and "v" shaped on the top and bottom.  well the top was an upside down "v".  this was to the right side of center screen.  also there was some orange thingy (different shape) to the very top left.  have video and still photos.  at some point the orange thing went away.  didn't see it go.  the bright white light did strange things.  it started to disappear from the top, but not straight across. i could see the movement of it falling apart.  eventually there was only a tiny bit left of it and a fine blue line showed up.  eventually the whole thing was gone.  did i say i have photos and video of that?  well i do.  now i only have photos and video again at that port on october 1st.  i don't know why i missed the 29th and 30th because i didn't have wifi access.  on october 1st there were big things going on in port canaveral.  got a lot of stills and video.  there were a whole bunch of these very bleary somewhat big dots but not perfectly round.  anyhow most of them changed their shape and just disappeared all together.  again there were orangy/yellow "dots" as well as white.  some bright and some not so much.  some i could see white lines (even on the white "dots") developing before my eyes.  some had one and some  had two.  some dots seem to split in half and a white line would form vertically whereas some were horizontal.  when i went back later that night and the next morning, everything was gone.  haven't seen any activity since then, but i keep looking.  now just a few days ago that ship that was in bermuda before came back.  this time it was facing the right direction.  i made a point of start watching it before dusk.  i had checked into the port earlier in the day to see if it would show up when it was still light out.  at first there was nothing there.  then i was thinking i was seeing this object again but wasn't sure.  a matter of a few minutes later i was definitely seeing it, but it was a faint color blue. as time went by it got a more solid shape and darker blue.  eventually it was black as i had seen on previous trips.  oh this time there was a ship parked in that other location in the port.  the two ships bows were facing each other and fairly close.  now this time there were like three faint white "dots" between the two bows.  the other things i had been seeing in port canaveral were not perfectly round like these i was seeing in bermuda.  i would like to know what all that stuff is....From circus shape tents to disappearing and changing shaped "dots" to big black objects in the sky are.  got any answers for me?  they don't fly, so technically they are not ufo's.
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Disc,   Flash,   Sphere,   Other
content.summary: 3 different events (and dates) over cruise ship ports.  two in florida & one i in bermuda

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was venting to a friend on the phone. i live near a pond, i had just gotten out of work it was about 1:30am october 10th. i was sitting in a fold up chair with my supper in my lap when i noticed lights, they weren't very bright. they were large dim lights about the size of a small car's hub cap 16"-18". they appeared to be that size guessing from the distance. it was at the other end of the sky ne of me. i couldn't see any structure in between the lights just the lights. they were lined up like ducks, like a triangle without the bottom line. there were about 6-8 lights on each side and it seemed to be maybe 100ft above the pine trees. it crossed the sky right over me towards the sw then the lights just faded out. it didnt zip off or anything the lights just faded out but the craziest thing about it is there was absolutely no sound which being that close eliminates anything man made. i just wish someone else saw and or reoorted it cause im stil shaken up and wondering if im losing it but i know what i saw and it was way to low, big and silent to be of the world.
content.summary: It appeared out of no where, flew by the faded

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling north on i-17 in sunrise, florida. as i was approaching the 4 story chrysler/jeep/dodge dealership on my right, i first noticed 4 red/orange lights above the left side of the road. the lights were about 50 ft. above the ground. the lights were in the exact shape of the left half of an octagon. about 2 seconds later as i was still driving north, i noticed 3 of the same red/orange lights on the right hand side of the road. this group of the red/orange lights outlined the shape of a large triangle and it was hovering/descending south. the triangle formation was lower in altitude compared to the first formation. i drove right under the triangle formation as it was moving over my car.
content.summary: Traveling north on i-75. observied 4 red/orange lights then 3 red/orange lights in the shape of a triangle hovering/decending close to the road.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck with dog around 2300 hrs. i was looking east from chair when one bright orange and white colored orb came down. then two orange balls went west then 20 min later two more went west slowed down then up and away into west, two at a time. the four had same path and direction, they were silent. lit-up the tree tops, very bright at first. there were lots of people on a porch who saw them too. the dog (lab) got excited too when they passed by. wow what did we just see.. could not stabilize pictures on camera as they were going west leaving.
content.summary: Decent then two orange balls then 20 min later two  more went west slowed down then up and away into west . the four had same path and direction, were silent. lit the tree tops up.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 3am i awoke to stand outside on my deck. i believed what i was seeing was a plane or possibly helicopter however it was staying in one spot going to the right then left and at times up and down. i awoke my wife stating, "you need to come see something." my wife stood on the deck and witnessed the same. greenish pulsating rhythmic lights were seen but the object moved left then right, over and over. approximately  30 seconds after my wife was watching with me, a very fast rapid white beam shot from that object. that did not happen again. my wife went to sleep and the object remained hovering until approx 5am. i did not see it disappear as i had gone back to sleep.
content.summary: Approx 3 am witnessed object in sky with pulsating regular green lights. large fast beam shot out from craft

content.detailedDescription: 1030 at night on a monday outside on porch smokin cigar when i noticed a very very bright orange light take off from ground from approx 1 mile away.As it ascended it turned very bright white with no trail or vapor,at first i thought it was a flare but i saw this for 15 mins as it flew directly at me directly overhead with no sound at all as it approached i could see counterclockwise rotating white lights.Hard to beleive no one else saw this as it was bright as the moon.Was approx 100 ft across and flew 300 ft directly above me,i was scared,interested,all at oncewent inside grabbed ell phone to call my wife to see if she had film in camera,she thought i was nuts but as god as my witness i will take any lie test i know what i saw,it wasnt a plane,it wasnt a star,it wasnt a helicopter,the only thing i would compare it too is a blimp but this was completely round with a grey color with absolutely no sound and flew in a strait path.It looked like a childs sit n spin with a done under it.  went back outside at 1045 and too my surprise i saw another take off from same spot,much much smaller and flew from se to sw a totally different path but this one stood far away but much smaller same colors and flew directly strait no zig zag and both flew at constant slow speed.  first one i noticed for 15 mins the second one about 5 mins...   was waitin too see if anyone else came forward but they didnt ,everythime im on porch smokin i stare up at sky waitin to c another which i doubt will ever happen.  when i told family they beleived but were reluctant,its always on my mind and all i think of when will i see another!!!     this object was very very very bright orange,flew directly over the braga bridge its impossible to beleive noone else saw it which is why im writing,im curious on what it was but also on how many people saw it.. it was during the persied meteor showers but this was no meteor i know the differece as this flew dirctly over my head for 15 mins.. til the day i die i know what isaw.If the airport said it was a plane they are full or crap,i know what i saw!!!!!!
content.summary: Saw ascention of object from approx 1 mile away bright orange strait up then turned white and flew directly overhead completely silent with counter clockwise lights,15 mins later saw another from same direction but not as bright

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two others were on our back patio at about 9:30pm central time, which faces north. as a pilot and living near the flight path for iah i probably notice aircraft more than the layman. we first noticed two orange/yellow spears traveling east to west just above our visual tree line. they were followed by 30 or more seemingly equidistant from each other traveling the same direction and appeared to be considerably lower altitude than commercial air traffic we noticed during the event.
the event lasted about twenty minutes. yes they looked like chinese lanterns but were traveling in two straight flight paths and in pairs as they traveled from east to west.
i expected the sighting to be all over the news but cannot find any reference to the occurrence in any local media.
ive seen strange, unexplained (to me) objects in the sky before but i have to tell you this was darn scary.
content.summary: 30 or more objects traveling east to west. they were orange/yellow and in a loose formation.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
There were four witnesses during this event. my boyfriend zeke, my little brother devin, our best friend john and i myself were in our car going to pick up a friend who lives in parish, fl. since we live more into bradenton, fl we get really observant when there are no lights to obstruct our view of the night sky. 

as we drove down the road which had no lights we saw the two objects above the tree line. this was the first time we saw them. i only saw two blue lights which were about a mile away. zeke who was not driving started yelling, saying that they were flying around each other in a tight circle. as we went further down the road we lost sight of them. 

after we had turned into the entrance of our friends neighborhood we changed our heading direction to the south and out of nowhere right in front of us the two objects appeared again, this time in full view. they were also a lot closer, way less than a mile away.  

as we freaked out a little bit we became silent as the objects began to orbit themselves again. this time they dropped into a graceful spiral and flew down towards the ground in the shape of dna and left light trails behind them (not too powerful, the light resembled aura light instead). 

the detail that i could see had tripled since we first saw them down the road. they did not seem solid or like "ships" at all. they were made of delicate blue lights which wove around intricately to create a shape that i cannot describe. all i can say is that they were "not absolutely geometrical" but they were the same.

they preformed one of the most graceful flight patterns i have ever seen. it was similar to a dance, like two eagles wooing one another and it was absolutely beautiful.  

i stopped the car and we lost sight of them through the trees ahead. we look for them a little bit but we were already late to pick our friend up so we found his house and as we waited for him to come outside we all got out of the car to look some more to see if they would come back. they did not but a helicopter immediately flew into sight coming from the east (inland) and traveled diagonally out to the west (the coast) towards the palmetto-bradenton area. it flew through that exact same air space where we observed to light objects.  we could hear the helicopter, saw it's blinking lights and watched as it just kept flying towards that coastline.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Two beautiful ufo with blue aura dancing in the sky above parish, fl

content.detailedDescription:
I was attending acl festival 2013 at zilker park, austin, travis county, texas.  a friend & i were laying on the grass looking up at the clouds where the park's spotlights were bouncing around.  at the time it was mostly cloudy with the crescent moon occasionally appearing & now & then a star through a hole in the clouds.  it was around 9 p.M. & the cure was playing--  we were laying facing southish because downtown was to our north.  i saw the lights first--  they were orange, in a clear triangle shape, spaced perfectly apart from one another.  they were below the clouds & were probably moving in a vaguely ne direction across the park.  we couldn't see any visible structure between the lights.  at one point one of the lights seemed to move ahead--  but i think whatever craft it was tilted or dipped slightly.  we watched it until it disappeared into the clouds--  it hovered at one point, directly over the park where the spot lights were going up more densely--  then it proceeded on across & it was hard to tell due to the clouds, but i think it ascended up higher through them.  it didn't seem to be in any big hurry, but it didn't stick around either.  the whole thing from start to finish was probably 4 minutes from the time i spotted it to the time it disappeared.  

i took a pic of it with my camera phone--  i'd already put away the nikon because earlier we had thought it was going to rain as the wind had picked up--  but then it didn't until later.  you can't see the orange color in this photo, & it was a lot more impressive & distinct than this makes them look.  i was in disbelief--  i live in west texas where there is little light pollution & star gazing is one of my fave past times.  i have seen lights in the past i couldn't really explain-- except they didn't appear to be an airplane, a blimp, a jet, a helicopter, etc--   but nothing i have ever looked up & seen & thought whoa!  i was so stunned it took me a couple of minutes to realize i could get a photo of it, honestly.  i've heard about triangle light ufos & i've seen photos of them, videos, but i never dreamed i'd look up over austin & see one.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 orange lights appeared under cloud cover at acl festival, zilker park, austin.

content.detailedDescription:
This request was taken by nick voulgaris cfi mufon ny for mufon hq. the witness does not have email and requested a telephone interview. 

the witness is 28 years old lives with his mother, unemployed fisherman, and takes medication for bi-polar disorder. he drinks socially and lives in new bedford 41.6362 - 70.9342. 

the witness clams to see three bright lights coming from the west observed from sept. 7 to sept 11. they appear from dusk to late at night. he also reported to police sometime in aug. of this year an translucent being on his neighbors roof.
content.summary: Three bright stars at night

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my kitchen at the time looking up through the skylight window watching low cloud cover moving past our house in an easterly direction. i suddenly noticed a disc-shaped object approximately 500ft. directly over the house partially concealed in light cloud cover. this object was travelling in the same direction when it abruptly turned at 90 degrees to the right and again two more 90 degrees to the right in a square-shaped fashion.

the object appeared to have luminescent type lights underneath in a set pattern of a circle and perhaps rectangular in shape. they did not appear to pulsate, rotate, or change pattern in any way and were white in color. the object seemed to be a polished silver color but because of the low cloud cover it was difficult to be certain. there did not appear to be any other noticable features such as rotation of the disc other than a sudden change in direction followed by it hovering in one spot. i very briefly (2 seconds) looked down away from straining my neck muscles from looking straight up and when i did look up again it had disappeared.

i mentioned this sighting to my wife but she thought i was joking. this sighting was not reported for the same reasons. this made me doubt what i saw but something unusual did happen during that short encounter. noone else was present to be a witness. the object appeared to be approximately 20-50 feet in diameter reckening the altitude as mentioned above. no markings noticed and it appeared to fly at level flight.

speed is difficult to ascertain, but during my very brief observation, there were no great speed records seen, e.G. car speed around 50mph. just before turning at 90 degrees. during this phase, i noticed a much slower speed. it hovered about 5-10 seconds but missed the departure direction and speed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Travelled about 500ft.Going east, inside some low cloud cover over my house, turned 90 degrees right 3 times in square pattern and hovered.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south at the far southeast edge of simi valley, just about to get on the road that hugs the hills there, on my way to santa susana pass.  when i spotted this huge, curled wing above the chatsworth hills, probably 300 ft above the hill, just hovering, then slid backwarsds and to its left (appeared to go west but unsure).  it was partly cloudy and it was under overcast clouds as was i, but there was patchy sunlight all around.  it was crystal clear and huge!  it was also stunni.Gly beautiful, had an amazing graceful design and unlike anything ive ever seen before....It was so real itlooked amazing.  i was driving my sister home from work...When i saw it, i immediately pulled over and stopped the car, anticipating that it was going to come over the hill and into view...But it backed out of there!!  my sister did not witness it.  we quickly drove to the other side of the hill range, but it was gone.  honestly the most amazing thing ive ever witnessed.  anyone else see this thing??  i will mention it was hovering over an old rocket test site....The ground there is severely contaminated because of that.  there are plenry of places something that size could land back in there.
content.summary: Extremely large, looked like huge curved backwards wings, it looked like a huge curl.

content.detailedDescription: I just woke up like i normally do on any given day around 4:40am. my window is at the foot of my bed and i have a good view of the stars/sky. i came back from the bathroom and looked out the window to see the stars. to my left (se sky) i saw what looked like 3 lights together and thought it was a helicopter until it zoomed to my right and then up a bit to hover there in the southern sky. it was all one light by this time of various blues and predominately bright white. every now and again the blue fuzzy portion would extend a little bit and then merge with the bright white light. there was no sound. then it just winked out and was gone. i am very curious when i see this because this isn't my first sighting. i did try to film it but the sky was too dark for me to pick up that one light. it's just a pocket digital camera.
content.summary: First saw it se looked like 3 lights together then it zoomed w to hover 5 degrees higher at a point in the southern sky.

content.detailedDescription: I'm in my house sleeping in a room to the right of the hall sleeping i'm dreaming of me and a childhood teen fleeing from security on a school campus grounds. as i'm dreaming i wake up to my heart thumping as if i had went for a run or jog then all of suddenly i wake up to a bright white light appearing right outside of my window. i get up to look out my window to see what appear like a small white plane hovering over my backyard. then it began hovering away but would appear flying as if it was a small civilian plane. this ended shortly after i had woke up at 3:58 a.M. . shortly after i had noticed it had hovered towards a old gulf course right behind the backyard and when it did i could also notice a humming sound then the sound changed to a small civilian plane. i felt scared, threatened, and confused to why this could be happening not only have i felt emotional afterwards but i could also feel static electricity i believed i had picked up from the flying object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It appeared as a white plane that quickly descended and became hovering over my house.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving into town from lake blackshear on mckinney road. when i turned on mckinney road,(from scenic route road), and topped the first hill i noticed what i thought was a law enforcement car with it's blue lights making a stop, on coney road. coney rd. intersects mckinney rd. about a mile down the road. the pulsating light looked like they were on coney rd. about a 1/4 mile to my right. as i drove toward coney i noticed the blue pulsating light was coming across the field parallel to mckinney rd. toward me. it was about 50 to 60 feet out in the field and about 25 feet off the ground. the object had a dull white glow and had a blue bright fuzzy halo that was pulsating. the object including the halo was about 12 to 16 feet across with the white center being approx. 4 to 5 1/2 feet across. i was traveling at about 40 mph and i estimate the object was traveling toward me at 10 to 20 mph at this point. i pulled over and got out of my truck and observed the object travel pass me. the object then took off over the lake at a approx. 45 degree angle, what looked to me, into space in fractions of a second. i looked back toward coney rd. trying to make sense of it all and then looked back toward the lake. when i looked back the object was hovering over an irrigation rig that was in use, pulsating and hovering over the end water jet. i noticed the intensity of the pulses increasing and got scared. i got in my truck and finished driving into town. as i drove off, i looked back, but i could not see the object.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: At distance a blue pulsating light, up close white solid object w/ blue halo pulsating.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the acl fest during the cure about 845 pm and was a bit far back so was videoing with my phone the amazing searchlight display and stage light show.  i'd taken several vids.  i noticed obove left and behind the stage three lights flickering ogden yellow orange in the formation of a triangle tumbling slowly north trough the sky.  i couldn't believe i was seeing a classic triangle ufo formation so having already taken several vids i had the phone ready after i pulled it out and unlocked it and took a 30 second video there bout at 855 pm.  i did take time to zoom in a bit before hitting the red button.  i followed it until it faded into the clouds going north.  i know my husband saw it before me but he only confirmed my seeing it when i mentioned it then i videoed.  after taking the video i discussed what i thought it was with my husband.  i then inquired of other concert goers if they saw the lights and got several no's and two yes"'s.  i asked permission to have the guys email and he gave it to me.  i did not ask for the girls because she was very occupied making out with her boyfriend, (they were so cute).
content.summary: Three lights flickering golden yellow orange in a triangle formation tumbling slowly on course north until it faded into clouds, at the cure section of acl  fest, i captured on phone video, shared experience with husband, found another concert goer as wit

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was taking a mud road home and i stopped to go to the bathroom.
2. about a year ago i was taking this same road at night and i saw something i couldn't explain. so now i randomly take this road just hoping to witness something again and get a photo. so when i stepped out of the truck i was looking around while i was going to the bathroom and off to the west there was this bright pulsating light. 
3. a huge star or falling star.
4. it kind of flickered and pulsated. it stayed around the same area pulsating. it kind of looked like it was changing colors slightly but when i got home and zoomed in on the pictures you can really see the object was changing colors.
5. i was very nervous, very uneasy but very curious and really wanting proof. i got really nervous when i started to drive off and it seemed to follow me but continued to stay on my west side.
6. it continued to follow me but staying on my west side. when i turned and headed east and got close to hwy 75 it just disappeared.
content.summary: Unknown object

content.detailedDescription:
I filmed the event with my phone
i tought it was too big  and bright to be an airplane and it did not move the same way
content.summary: I saw the first object and 1 mn later a second one following the same path moved slowly almost stationary at some point

content.detailedDescription: Spotted orange light  hovering in sky, went into house grabbed lazer went back out and shined lazer at it since there where no blinking aircraft lights on it. it disappeared.
content.summary: Orange object hovering sw of ligonier, flashed lazer at it and it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My room mate walked outside to the back yard to smoke she looked up and immediately called out i ran out side and saw 40+ objects moving at a steady pace across the western sky due north.We all ran through the house and went to the front yard. it initially looked like bubbles from a childs bubble hoop but the direction of travel was not erratic like a stray bubble, rather they traveled at a consistent pace. the moved like a bubble but appeared to have a white light in the interior of them. we watched them travel north until it looked like they came to a stop and just faded away.Another car actually stopped and asked us if we just saw what they had saw. every one was confused of exactly what they were.I attempted to film it with my camera on my phone but due to the excitement didn't push start...
content.summary: Almost bubble like

content.detailedDescription: I have sony hand cam video of 40 minuntes of this sphere,what ever it is,and its happening nightly,complete family has seen it to witness,and i have video clips of full clarity,and it is defintley there every 24 hours ,in an`southwest orbit path. around or at 7;45 each evening last to 8:40 approximately? i do have the substantial clear video of this craft, satellite or ufo, look and see,what you think? it is located from soutghern ohio,looking to the lower south southwest,looks like a bright star,but it isn`t?  video is 26x  by 150x zoomed,its there!
content.summary: White sphere with large full bottom opening and window above and 270 lense 4 landing struts

content.detailedDescription: For the last week or so i have seen a large,star like object hovering close to my house in the night sky.It hovers there for hours..Then when i look again its gone.The other night i was watching it like i do almost every night and it started to move , slowly at first,,then it took off overhead towards the east at a very high speed.I also have been seeing smaller objects usually about 4 or 5 near the larger object.They are starlike but have flickering lights that look white and pink/red.They move in circles, up and down.They go back and forth and sometimes cross each others path.After the larger object left they remained.At first when i first noticed these objects i thought they were weather balloons and the larger object was a star or planet.When i witnessed the large object actually move i was in shock.Whty would it hover for hours then just take off.The small objects dont just float like balloons..They change directions rapidly.I am curious,scared, worried and amazed all at the same time.
content.summary: One large object hovered for hours then took off rapidly.4 smaller ones moved  all over near the big one.

content.detailedDescription: Returning home, observed single white light at high (above cloud level) altitude. light pulsed every 1 second. light moved from west to east-northeast. could not see wingtip marker lights. commercial aircraft was observed in vicinity travelling from south to north, red strobe and wingtip markers clearly visible. retrieved binoculars and observed object as it passed nearly overhead. consisted of dim white or blue lights fore and aft and brighter blinking light at center. could hear no aircraft noise. appeared to be similar size as commercial airliner if at similar altitude (30000 - 40000 feet). impossible to gauge actual altitude, but clearly above cloud height. possible commercial aircraft with light malfunction?
content.summary: Pulsating white light, high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
Had just left the movies theatre and was in the parking area for the farmers market in cordova,tn. it was right at 15:00 hrs. was stopped discussing what to do about dinner. we were looking/facing the north when i noticed, a good mile away what i initially though were two parachutists under canopy. i asked my girlfriend if she saw what i was seeing and she did. i continued looking and saw the objects were approaching and not descending. i also saw one of the objects moving into and away from the one/other object. i think this movement was what initially caused me to think of them as parachutists, like if they were doing some canopy relative work. the objects continued to move toward us and it became my impression that they were gradually ascending and that they were spherical in nature and silent. the one object remained on a true and steady course and the other object would maintain like a wingmans distance and then rapidly approach the one object to a very close distance, move left or right, jinx about a bit, and then resume a distance. as they continued to approach i got out of the car to hopefully get a clearer sight of them. at this time they were probably at about a 45-50 degree angle above the horizon to me. i commented that they seemed to have some reflectivity to their greyish/leaden colored surface. the sky was overcast with some light coming through. as they got overhead it was my impression that they were probably approx. 1500 - 2000 ft. up. the one that had been darting about had separated more and disappeared into the overcast. the one that had been steady had by now taken a course to the s.E. and continued to gradually gain altitude and soon disappeared into the overcast, appeared again on its' heading and then finally disappeared into the overcast not to be seen again. the entire sighting probably lasted 7 to maybe 10 minutes.  when i originally saw them to the north they were approx.20 degrees above the horizon. through out the sighting i only felt a growing curiosity as i realized i couldn't attribute what i was seeing to any type of aircraft or airfoil, balloon. the rock steady course taken by the one and the "playful" attitude of the other in such very close proximity to the steady one ruled out, for me, windborn objects. 
   if anybody else in this area saw these objects i'd sure appreciate an email from you guys. if there is anything else i can do to help feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Both approached from north silently. one object darting towards and away from the other one.

content.detailedDescription: 10 to 12 lights rose from horizon area around 7:45 pm in central ohio, i felt something behind me and turned around thinking it may be chinese lanterns or large christmas lights very high up.  lights then formed into various patterns resembling  tornadic swirls , orion the hunter, then a small hatchet shape appeared with the 12 lights forming the boxy top and then the long handle.  that was the final formation before they progressively faded out one by one as they drifted upward in the sky to the north. the last one lingered as it seemed to understand we didn't want it to leave and we were truly focused and fascinated as the final light lingered and faded , lasting longer than the others.  the lights seemed to possess an intelligence.  the whole encounter lasted about 3 minutes as my boyfriend and i were canoeing on a small lake. we will never be the same. life altering experience.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 10 to 12 lights in ne sky low pulsation and formation into various patterns

content.detailedDescription:
On 10-12-13, 8:00pm, while looking at the night sky from my back yard, i observed initially a red light coming out of the east. it appeared to be at a normal aircraft altitude, but i could see that the light was solid red and not strobing like a normal navigation light would. i grabbed my 10x50 binoculars from the house and observed that the object was comprised of 3 lights altogether, with the red light being on the starboard side. the other two lights were white (lead light and port side).

the 3 lights were in a triangle pattern and remained as solid lights for the entire duration i observed it (approx. 7 minutes)as it headed away from me going due west. as the craft was nearly directly above me, the red starboard light suddenly went from the bright red, to a matching white of the other two lights on the craft.

as the craft was cruising at the speed of a normal aircraft, my guess would be about 500mph and at a altitude of about 40,000 ft. my guess would be that the craft size was that of about a normal airliner. 

if i had held a ruler at arms length, i would say that the lights on the craft would of been evenly spaced, about a quarter of a inch apart from each other. i could easily see the craft with the naked eye. i tried to look for details on the craft with my binoculars that would tell me if this was a normal aircraft, but i did not see any of the normal tell/tale signs. there were no strobing navigation lights and no tail section lights
at all.

i consider aviation as a hobby of mine and enjoy aviation history. i am familiar with most aircraft and can easily identify known aircraft & detect objects in the night sky like satellites, the space station, landing lights of approaching aircraft, etc,... i believe that most individuals would not of noticed this particular sighting as unusual and dismissed it as a normal aircraft flying overhead. i knew better. 

thank you!
content.summary: Observed 3 (non - strobing) lights in a triangle shape. did not resemble normal aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Wsyx (local channel 6) received numerous calls about this incident last night around 9 to 10pm. my personal observation was n/w of my house. a solid white light moving left to right rapidly. back and forth for about 3 minutes. interesting that the light kept the same distance from left to right each time. it never traveled further to either side. the light then descended behind a tree line. reappeared briefly above the treeline then vanished. some people reported the light changing colors. mine was a solid white light. please investigate this as it had many, many people startled across several different locations.
content.summary: Multiple witnesses from different counties reported high levels of activity north, n/w of columbus

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped outside for a cigarette, and happened to walk out towards road when my eye was drawn to a bright white light of triple intensity of normal star moving rapidly toward the north. thought for a second or two that it was an aircraft, until i realized that there were no tell-tail flashes of wing or tail strobes. ran inside to get cameraphone, and attempted to film object - however due to darkness am unsure whether video will show anything. 

roughly 10 seconds after beginning to film, light faded out.

from first sighting it till it faded out was aprox. 45 seconds. 

will work on video and attempt to enhance brightness.
content.summary: Solid brite white light moving fast
